Once, in a sky filled with bold clouds, there lived a little cloud named Nimbus. Unlike his friends, Nimbus was afraid of heights. While they danced high above the mountains, he lingered low, gazing up with envy. One day, a gentle breeze whispered, “Why not try?” Gathering courage, Nimbus floated upward, heart racing. As he climbed, he discovered a breathtaking view of the world below. The sun painted the sky in hues of orange and pink, and he felt lighter than ever. Embracing his fear, Nimbus learned that heights held beauty, and he soared joyfully, no longer afraid but exhilarated.
